item.title: Season 2 Episode 7 - Captain Crimson
item.description: Enemy Roster Aboard the Divine Wind a motley assortment of Marrakesh’s most devious. Known to you are 212 captured crew of the Lod Royal Navy including Count Harold 180 pirates including Pilot Killfiend 40 of Captain Crimson’s personal lads including the “Tricky Six” Gila and her crew Crew chief Cobra ex-HA mercenary called Jormungandr At their disposal is The Divine Wind, a 100,000 ton carrier limping along on 1.

item.title: Season 2 Episode 6 - Divine Wind
item.description: The Knights arrive at the Divine Wind, flagship of Lod.

item.title: Season 2 Episode 2 - Wrath of the Zhodani
item.description: Utopia - want samples Bran’s Cage - want Bran Secrets from Lod Secrets from Aslan Heirate.

item.title: Season 2 Episode 1 - Debts Come Due
item.description: There’s only one qualification to call yourself a MechWarrior, get in a mech fight and survive. But no matter what you call yourself, the mortgage is still due every month and the galaxy continues to turn.

item.title: IFF
item.description: The IFF (Interplanetary Friend Finder) is a continuously updated consensus-driven blockchain for providing cryptographically secure proof of identity.

item.title: Photonic Guandao
item.description: Requires 2 modification points to install. 5 energy damage, double damage against impaired targets, accurate. Threat range 2.
